text: @WhiteHouse Over 107,000 dead unnecessarily because of Trump's lies that Covid-19 was "going away" and delayed any action; 16% unemployment; lies, lies and more lies.  You are not convincing anyone. You will NOT be re-elected November 3, 2020.
